long_description: Put light in the palm of your hand. The Coleman Puck Light Extreme Lantern lights your way around a dark tent or campsite, all in a collapsible design that fits easily in your pack. Cree(R) LED bulbs provide 250 lumens of brightness on high, 50 on low. 4 hrs. runtime on high and 30 hrs. on low. Recharge the included lithium-ion battery with the included USB cable. Water-resistant construction; carabiner-style handle lets you hang the lantern from your belt loop or a tree branch. Coleman Puck Light Extreme Lantern measures 3 x 3.5 x 5 in. when open and a mere 2 x 3.5 x 3.5 in. when collapsed.
short_description: Put light in the palm of your hand. The Coleman Puck Light Extreme Lantern lights your way around a dark tent or campsite, all in a collapsible design that fits easily in your pack.
